verbs.description: President Trump [V: will] appear in the White House Rose Garden today , where he is expected to give some remarks while he observes the National Day of Prayer .

[ARG1: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: appear] [ARGM-LOC: in the White House Rose Garden] [ARGM-TMP: today , where he is expected to give some remarks while he observes the National Day of Prayer] .
President Trump will appear in the White House Rose Garden today , where he [V: is] expected to give some remarks while he observes the National Day of Prayer .
President Trump will appear in the White House Rose Garden today , [R-ARGM-LOC: where] he is [V: expected] [ARG1: to give some remarks while he observes the National Day of Prayer] .
President Trump will appear in the White House Rose Garden today , where [ARG0: he] is expected to [V: give] [ARG1: some remarks] [ARGM-TMP: while he observes the National Day of Prayer] .
President Trump will appear in the White House Rose Garden today , where he is expected to give some remarks while [ARG0: he] [V: observes] [ARG1: the National Day of Prayer] .
